entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 19. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
